Sign up for Honeywell's Maintenance Service Plan and receive:
- Reduction of overall maintenance costs - Emergency support 24 hours, 7 days a week, in the case of AOG - Access to field support system and a global network of authorized sales and service centers - Factory-backed support identical to your original factory warranty - Options that allow you to customize your protection plan based on your operational and aircraft needs and discounts for large fleets
